com.github.robocup_atan.atan.model

Class AbstractTeam

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.robocup_atan.atan.model.AbstractTeam

  • public abstract class AbstractTeam
extends Object
    An abstract class to use for teams.
    Author:
    Atan

    • Constructor Summary

      Connect the team to the server using the default player settings.

      Connect the team to the server using specified player settings.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractTeam

        public AbstractTeam(String teamName)
        Connect the team to the server using the default player settings. No coach.
        Parameters:
        teamName - The name of the team to connect.

      • AbstractTeam

        public AbstractTeam(String teamName,
            int port,
            String hostname,
            boolean hasCoach)
        Connect the team to the server using specified player settings. Uses default coach port.
        Parameters:
        teamName - The name of the team to connect.
        port - The port for players to connect to.
        hostname - The hostname to connect to.
        hasCoach - Does this team use a coach?

      • AbstractTeam

        public AbstractTeam(String teamName,
            int port,
            String hostname,
            boolean hasCoach,
            Properties additional)
        Connect the team to the server using specified player settings. Uses default coach port.
        Parameters:
        teamName - The name of the team to connect.
        port - The port for players to connect to.
        hostname - The hostname to connect to.
        hasCoach - Does this team use a coach?
        additional - Any additionl properties you may want for your team.

        public void killAll()
        Kill all players and the coach (if connected).

      • connectAll

        public void connectAll()
        Connect all the players to the server. ActionsPlayer with index 0 is always the goalie. Connects a coach if there is one.

      • connect

        public void connect(int index)
        Connect the selected player to the server. The player with index 0 is always the goalie.
        Parameters:
        index - The number of the player to connect.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the size of the team.
        Returns:
        The size of the team.
